channel.title: Community Game: The Triumvirate (RuneScape)
channel.description: Has anyone else noticed the similarity between RuneScape and World Of Warcraft lately?

item.title: Community Game: The Triumvirate (RuneScape)
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

i’d say i like games with good graphics but ultimately i’m looking for a game with good gameplay. i remember peole laughing because i was emulating the ps1 on my PSP and i was like “get real, i don’t care about graphics anyways”

Read full topic

item.title: Community Game: The Triumvirate (RuneScape)
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:24, topic:340657”][quote author=Frell link=topic=437027.msg3211964#msg3211964 date=1274326439]
Its called graphic style, learn it.
[/quote]
That’s correct I suppose. Some of the things in the game aren’t to the style I like to see is most definitely a better way to put it. They use low poly models for a lot of things and texture them heavily to make them look really good. Correct me if I’m wrong on that, but as far as I’ve seen in the game, that’s what happens.[/quote]
No, you’re not wrong. Current generation consoles do this also.

Read full topic

item.title: Community Game: The Triumvirate (RuneScape)
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

I do. Because you don't buy a game based on gameplay. If you've ever read gameinformer im sure you stop on the pages with spectacular images to see what game it is. The graphics are the first impression you have on any game.

Thats exactly what i look for is gameplay not graphics. I want to be entertained I don’t want a game that looks fantastic but has shit gameplay.

I use my ps3 as a emulator for ps1 games for this very reason

Read full topic

They’re not, its called catching up with current generation games.

I hate when WoW fanboys cry about other games copying them.
[/quote]

Or maybe its Runescape fanboys not wanting to copy WoW. Runescape was much better back in the day, but its getting worse, people don’t want a game like every other game.[/quote]Your making it sound like jagex’s fault.

item.title: Community Game: The Triumvirate (RuneScape)
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

idiots that have bitched and moaned about graphics in video games is the reason the game industy has gone to complete shit.

I do. Because you don’t buy a game based on gameplay. If you’ve ever read gameinformer im sure you stop on the pages with spectacular images to see what game it is. The graphics are the first impression you have on any game.

Look at assassins creed. I would have never bought it if i didnt see the amazing images i saw. And now their second one is even better with amazing graphics and gameplay.

But some people are stuck with

space-invaders.jpg1000×1200

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:7, topic:340657”][quote author=Frell link=topic=437027.msg3211377#msg3211377 date=1274284087]
They’re not, its called catching up with current generation games.

I hate when WoW fanboys cry about other games copying them.
[/quote]

  1. Please don’t go making assumptions, that I’m a fanboy cause im not.
  2. I hate it when people like you don’t have anything really that important to say.
  3. it’s not called catching up at all. I wouldn’t really call RuneScape a current generation game.
  4. Whos talking about catching up?, I was simply comparing the two similarities.[/quote]
    The WoW gameplay style is in tons of games, but Jagex used their gameplay styleback from RSC which is getting older and older. In order to get with the new generation (catch up) with the new games they have to change some things.

Of course a fanboy will say hes not a fanboy.

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:11, topic:340657”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=437027.msg3211386#msg3211386 date=1274286099]
idiots that have bitched and moaned about graphics in video games is the reason the game industy has gone to complete shit.
[/quote]ya for xbox and stuff. not for a fucking game coded with java and a bunch of guys who aren’t that talented of coders/designers. of course it would end up looking like shit[/quote]
You’re an idiot, guess what company is right behind blizzard and read up on how much the Gower brothers are worth.

Read full topic
